website_summaries.verdict: These cat nail caps have an ultra-soft texture that fussy felines might prefer, but unfortunately, this also makes it easier for cats to bite the tips off.
pros: Jumbo pack with 6 different colors delivers great variety
Adhesive is safe and dries fairly quickly
Thin, flexible texture is comfortable enough that most cats forget they're wearing them after a few minutes
cons: The glue is thin and runs easily
Stubborn cats might manage to bite them off

customer_reviews.title: Cute, easy to use, no more scratched furniture!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute, easy to use. My cat had no issues with them going on or even after. I had treats handy, filled a few caps at a time with the glue, sat my cat in my lap and slide those few on, then let him up for a treat before doing the next few. He stayed calm the whole time. I recommend sliding one on before applying glue the first time, just so you figure out how you want to do it.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie D

customer_reviews.title: which is a great bargain. Also worth noting is that these tips ...
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t realize I would get so many of the caps for this price, which is a great bargain. Also worth noting is that these tips are softer and more pliable than others I have used. This quality is great for me because I put them on my cat’s BACK paws to stop an itching habit she has, and the regular stiff ones are too curved for back claws. These worked great for the back claws and she isn’t able to hurt herself with her scratching anymore. Very happy and will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: nessajoy

customer_reviews.title: Best decision!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! I have an 8 month old 6lb cat and the medium seem to fit him good! I just put them on today and he licked/bit at them for about 5 min and now he doesn’t seem to notice them. He was scratching my furniture and climbing my blinds but I made the decision not to declaw him and have been debating getting these for awhile now. So happy I did!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My cat almost choked on these DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: First impression? These were great and my family could play a bit rougher with our little boy. However, I just had a to shove my finger into my cats mouth to remove one from the back of his throat. They have only been in on for a week and are pretty much crumbling apart. My cat got a large piece caught in his mouth and I had to remove it from a very unhappy scared cat! I WILL NOT BE PUTTING THESE ON HIM AGAIN AND WILL BE THROWING THESE DIRECTLY IN THE TRASH.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Tang

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to apply
customer_reviews.text: One of the cats is able to bite the caps off .. the other however has had the same set of caps on for about a month or so not a single one has fallen off they’re very easy to apply. For the price even if they fall off or get bit off you just put more on.
customer_reviews.author: Ariana Alleva

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Easy application. All colors came in seperate bags. Each with their own glue and glue tip for easy filling.
customer_reviews.author: MizzVivi84

customer_reviews.title: Stuck to cat
customer_reviews.text: The nails don't fall off like they should. I bought the name brand version of these before and they worked much better. I had to cut them off of my cat when they almost started growing back into her foot! Maybe it's the glue? Either way it cause her a lot of pain and I would not recommend putting them on your cat. The name brand ones are the way to go even if they are more expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Watland

customer_reviews.title: WEAR GLOVES
customer_reviews.text: Wear gloves when applying the caps and DO NOT TAKE THEM OFF until this demon glue is safely put away. The glue has a very watery consistency so it will get on your hands, especially when you’re wrestling with your cat. I wore gloves, but picked up the glue tube with bare hands not noticing it had leaked. Had to soak my hand in warm soapy water with nail polish remover to slowly get it off. On the other hand, my cat now has gorgeous nails he can’t seem to chew off no matter how hard he tries so I guess the product does do its job.
customer_reviews.author: Magdalena G.

customer_reviews.title: They work if you’re willing to upkeep
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my cat who destroyed carpets and expensive old lady couches. My family members threatened to get rid of her or get her declawed... so I got these. Not easy to put on if your cat values their personal space, they last a week or so before you need to start all over again. Cleaning, clipping, messing with the glue, ect. You have to re-apply individual caps that fall off from grooming and cat activities if you don’t want any chance of scratching.
customer_reviews.author: Bree

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would have get these sooner, like before I had cat scratches everywhere! I would definitely recommend. I got medium size for my cat and they fit great. They've lasted 3 weeks before one fell off then as they fell off I would replace. They do not bother my cat at all and she's a scratcher. Love these life savers!
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie

customer_reviews.title: Ute holiday kittie paws
customer_reviews.text: These took some time and patience to get on my 6 mo old kitten but were well worth it. We put them on one at a time because she was so wiggly and waited until she was sleeping. By the end, we were able to put on 3 at a time. I think she realized it was no big deal. We only put them on the front claws. The first few we applied fell off in a day or so but the rest are still on 2 weeks later. She doesn’t seem to mind them at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommended using!
customer_reviews.text: These are easy to use, concept is great, but my cat tore out his nails! We put them on him before we brought home our puppy so he could still "defend himself" without hurting the puppy and it worked great. But 2 weeks later, he had ripped out a few nails and we had to take him to the vet for infection.
customer_reviews.author: DK

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I have a cat that gets a bit too enthusiastic about scratching himself, so we ordered these in hopes that we could get him to stop scratching himself bloody. (It's not allergies, he's just neurotic.) They work perfectly! They are easy to put on, they don't hamper his walking, and now that we've applied them a few times, I can just plop him on my lap and cradle him while my partner sticks them on him. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Lilyn G.

customer_reviews.title: More pastel than pictured but a great product!
customer_reviews.text: The ones I got are a much more pastel blue and green than shown. But they work really well. The glue doesn't burn at all, which I've heard is a complaint from other brands. I had some pop off right away, but I probably didn't use enough glue on those. I love these and will be ordering them again.
customer_reviews.author: A. Heick

customer_reviews.title: Easy to apply!
customer_reviews.text: my cat has a bad habit on scratching up my furniture and rough play when the family mess with him. So far, these nail caps are easy to apply. It did come with an instruction and plenty of adhesive. Multi-color nail caps to choose from. My cat isn’t use to it, so he is trying to take them off. So far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: A M A Z I NG
customer_reviews.text: PERFECT for my kitten. We are not declawing him because of how cruel it is.. but I kept noticing tiny scratches on my dogs face from them playing together all day. I decided to give these a try! AMAZING! I also bought a nail grinder to grind the nails down as they do get long being in the nail caps. The glue dries super fast and it takes maybe 5-10 seconds per nail if you have someone helping you out. Truly amazing! And stylish
customer_reviews.author: Lindy

customer_reviews.title: I think the cat just really hated the idea
customer_reviews.text: We couldn't get them to stay on the cat - she kept ripping them off. That may not have anything to do with the nail caps, I think the cat just really hated the idea.
customer_reviews.author: LisaS

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but...
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my cat who rips up our furniture. We like them. He likes to chew on them and rip them off, but a few of them have lasted two weeks or longer. We just have to put them on as he rips them off. Sometimes I’m worried about the glue. I see him chewing on the nails and I hope the glue wouldn’t hurt him if he injested some. Also I’m worried about the glue sticking to his nail base and then his nail growtb getting messed up. We haven’t experienced any of that yet though! And they do prevent him from tearing up furniture. He still uses his scratcher, it just doesn’t do any real damage.
customer_reviews.author: Emma Petersen

customer_reviews.title: Good alternative.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very effective method to cap claws, but their durability depends on the cat. I had one cat where they all stayed on for a month, one where they were on for about a week before they started falling of one by one every few days or so, and one who got most of them off in a couple days.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: We have an adult cat that is on the smaller side. I read the reviews and thought they were still worth a shot. When they arrived, I wondered what large would be like, since the small size could fit a GIANT cat’s paws. They definitely won’t work on our cat.
customer_reviews.author: midwestgirl

customer_reviews.title: Great nail tips!!
customer_reviews.text: We bought these because are cat was scratching at the walls. They work well and she does not scratch as much on the walls. Most of them have lasted at least 3 weeks or more. I am happy with them and they are cute on her nails!
customer_reviews.author: M S

customer_reviews.title: Glue doesn't harden works great.
customer_reviews.text: I was extremely doubtful but these really work. My cat has always been good about nail trimming so it wasn't hard to apply. I give him treats after to distract him. I love that the glue doesn't harden even after it's open so I can keep using it to reapply as they fall off. I have an avg size cat I think and got medium
customer_reviews.author: Leblancfam

customer_reviews.title: I love these! They saved our cat from a permanent ...
customer_reviews.text: I love these! They saved our cat from a permanent unnecessary surgery and our sofa from the dump, so win for everyone! Just be sure to use ample glue or they will pull them off , more is better!
customer_reviews.author: MomInTheKnow

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Great item! They are so expensive at pet stores so these are worth it!! My kitten is still a bit too small for them but I did try to cut them down to fit and some stayed on. I think if you have the right size nail and good application they will last a decent time!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not terrible, but stronger glue please.
customer_reviews.text: Glad 120 came. Even after trimming the nails, they were off in a week. Worked for a couple days, but my cat hated putting them on and she scratched me pretty bad.
customer_reviews.author: Musicgeek21

customer_reviews.title: Hard to put on, but do work well
customer_reviews.text: Pros: these are such a god send. When they stick on the nail, they are the best. Cons: super hard to get on the nail if your cat isn’t about it. And it does take a minute or so for the glue to set, so if your cat runs away right after, there is a chance the cover will come off.
customer_reviews.author: Emma Eblen

customer_reviews.title: Good if your cat doesn’t mind them
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used several different kinds of nails for my cat. These were very cute and easy to use, but my cat had them off after an hour. And I tried using them more then once to the same result.
customer_reviews.author: Charitykb

customer_reviews.title: Works just as well as the name brand caps
customer_reviews.text: I like these claw caps just as well as the name-brand claw caps. They fit my cats claws well and they stay on. I give this product 4 stars because my kitty wears through the end and her claw will be sticking out by week 2-3.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: These cat nail caps are the worst.
customer_reviews.text: After less than 24 hours on my cats, over half of the nail caps no longer had tips. Due to the fact that part of the old nail cover is still there, I am unable to replace them, and my cat is still able to scratch things. I've NEVER had this problem with other brands, and since I've used cat nail covers before I know that I put them on correctly and that the caps are the right size for my cats. These covers would probably be fine if your cats don't mess with their nail caps at all but I feel that's a bit unrealistic.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for my cat.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted this item to work because my cat likes to claw around her face and neck, No problem putting them on but it was only the next day I found them on the floor and in 2 days they were all off. They may work for you.
customer_reviews.author: Albertine Perrier

customer_reviews.title: These work...
customer_reviews.text: We have used these on our shredder cat for the past three months and they are unbelievable. Yes, we have to replace 1-2 a week, but they do the job. New couch is still pristine a month in and the looped carpet in our new house is snag free. Follow the instructions and stay on it weekly and you can keep your furniture and carpets intact. Cat does not love the “kitty soft paws”. It we do!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Fabian

customer_reviews.title: Can be tricky, have a partner
customer_reviews.text: These work great and the cat has no problem with them on. However, the first application can be a struggle, so be sure to have a partner and only do a couple claws at a time!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin S.

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Great deal for all that you get! If you have an middle age stubborn cat, it's not ideal. Even after a month my cats were both still chewing theirs off after replaced several times. They fit well if you follow the guidelines but in conclusion they would probably be more beneficial for kittens!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Smith

customer_reviews.title: quite the hassle
customer_reviews.text: the idea behind these is decent but the reality is they're a hassle to put on and the kitten chews them off within seconds. Granted it's hilarious to see your cat wearing neon fake nails but not worth the headache- just pay to get your cat declawed.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie J Olson

customer_reviews.title: FURNITURE SAVER
customer_reviews.text: I was pet sitting a family members cat for a few months an kept scratching are stuff so I found theses an they work amazing work recommend to anyone!!! LIFE SAVER an family member though they where so cute so she ordered more for them when cat went back home
customer_reviews.author: Alissa

customer_reviews.title: Just buy a scratch pad. It'll work better and they'll be happier.
customer_reviews.text: My cat just bit them off. The adhesion is good, but the glue will get on the fur (they will move). Also, when he'd bite them off, part of his nail would always come off with it (ouch). It was just a painful process. I followed the directions and tried with two colors. That was enough. Just buy a scratch pad.
customer_reviews.author: Christie

customer_reviews.title: They work, but expect to be replacing them weekly.
customer_reviews.text: They do their job, however the glue doesnt last until they naturally shed off as mentioned; somehow my cat still manages to get off at least 1 cap a week.
customer_reviews.author: Arriana Carmona

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: my cats hated them at first but shes gotten used to them but i love them the're cute and i hate the idea of getting her declawed and they stay on for a long time so i give 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Destiney

customer_reviews.title: Your weird furry roommate would like you to do their nails.
customer_reviews.text: These caps fit great and make your weird furry roommate super pretty! Much cheaper with more caps than name-brand with the same quality.
customer_reviews.author: Chris H.

customer_reviews.title: Great value and very well packaged
customer_reviews.text: Great product as there are many to choose from because these are packaged well in the kit. Good quality as well, my cats havent been able to ruin furniture for a few months now.
customer_reviews.author: Suvi Viswanathan

customer_reviews.title: They work great!
customer_reviews.text: Lots of colors. Our kitten is a vicious attack animal (he’s also adorable) These work great and keep him from clawing my legs all day! He’s tried to get them off several times and they’ve stayed in place. Several cute colors
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Clipped to fit kitten.
customer_reviews.text: I really love these nail caps. The only thing I wish I would have known is that they come in different sizes in each packet. I ordered XS and I expected them all to be the same size. I didn't realize the were different sizes based on toes. She was pissed at us during the application process but they don't seem to bother her at all. Also - she is a 3 lb. Kitten, and XS were large on her but I used nail clippers to trim the nail caps to size.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher K

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Good price for how many caps you get I love the variety of colors. I wish the rubber was a bit stronger my cat keeps biting them off..
customer_reviews.author: Khadijah Martin

customer_reviews.title: Good in theory....
customer_reviews.text: These didn't really stay on my cat, no matter how much glue. He would chew them off. Also, of your cat has long hair, it's hard to get the cap on without getting hair glued in the cap.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda

customer_reviews.title: Ripped my cats nail out
customer_reviews.text: Would 100% not endorse this product, after less than a week my cat was biting the caps off. The glue, which is essentially super glue, ripped parts of my cat's nail off and caused bleeding. This product is going in the trash, would never recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dale

customer_reviews.title: Like!
customer_reviews.text: Difficult cat makes everything hard and chewed most off so not sure if product flaw or her determination.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Good quality pretty Colors. A new glue for each set. My cat is 4 mos. I ordered small. She kept them on a week. Gonna Try again. I think it was first time error in my part. I would recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Karaokequeen

customer_reviews.title: Adheres too well
customer_reviews.text: Be careful with the glue. It took a while to get these safely off my cats. They went on easy and worked great. Test the fit first, then apply.
customer_reviews.author: Mercedes Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: These are great for the price
customer_reviews.text: These are great for the price, higher quality than expected. They stay on about as long as other brands. I suggest buying more glue and tips separately.
customer_reviews.author: Leticia

customer_reviews.title: you don't have to clip your cats claws for application ...
customer_reviews.text: you don't have to clip your cats claws for application, it actually made it harder to glue on but they worked very well!
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: These fall off easily, no matter how much glue I use
customer_reviews.text: These fall off easily, no matter how much glue I use. They work just wished they stayed on longer than a week
customer_reviews.author: FMiller

customer_reviews.title: I would still purchase them
customer_reviews.text: I had these caps put on my cats claws my cat bit them off IDK if the glue was weak but on the first day 3 off the caps came off mostly on her back set of claws
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Claw protection
customer_reviews.text: Not the easiest to get on a cat, a couple got bit off already, but our furniture has a little more protection now
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: I recommend
customer_reviews.text: They work exactly as they’re supposed to and they make my cats feet look pretty
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea M

customer_reviews.title: No more scratching! My furniture or me!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product super easy to use and gets the job done! My kitten looks amazing wearing them and my furniture is now safe around her! I recommend it 100%
customer_reviews.author: Julissa

customer_reviews.title: Order a size down
customer_reviews.text: Adhesive isn't good. My kitty pulled 2 off in less than a minute. Also, order down a size from what you think you need.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Has stopped my cat from clawing up the carpets completely. Very happy with my purchase. Bonus perk, they look so cute!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Dunn

customer_reviews.title: They work great
customer_reviews.text: my vet and I think they are great saves the furniture and litter bags
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Nordeen

customer_reviews.title: Save your furnishings!
customer_reviews.text: Stopped cat from destroying furnishings. One came off after a week..replacement put on.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Great Product. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.text: The cutest thing and keeps my cat from scratching my furniture. He doesn't even notice them. Took two minutes to apply to nails and have stayed on for over a week
customer_reviews.author: Jane Garrison

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good way to keep your funiture safe(ish).
customer_reviews.text: We have 4 cats and they seem to last fairly well.
customer_reviews.author: DJ Hartley

customer_reviews.title: Not even worth the effort
customer_reviews.text: These did not work. My cat had them off in a couple hours. I have tried them over and over and each time he gets them off
customer_reviews.author: jeno1031

customer_reviews.title: I was wrong!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical the first time I saw these, but holy cat!!! They are easy to apply and keep my babies from scratching the furniture! Cool item!
customer_reviews.author: Charity Rollins Brown

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Cat looks fabulous,, and class her up so good she could be in a Wayans brother movie.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: We love them. He can quit scratching everything and look fashionable with inhumanely having his nails taken from him. These are great!
customer_reviews.author: eShop

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Wasn’t a fan I’ve used nail products b4 and nvr had a problem my cats tried bitting these off and seemed to hurt them I won’t be ordering this kind again.
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: Work great
customer_reviews.text: Buy your own glue, but the value for the caps is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Glittery

customer_reviews.title: I ordered a medium but they look like an XL on my cats nails
customer_reviews.text: Not a fan of these. I ordered a medium but they look like an XL on my cats nails. They fell off very quickly. Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: Great price for something way overpriced at the pet store!
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Schleeter

customer_reviews.title: Work very well
customer_reviews.text: Cats were not crazy about getting them applied, but get used to them fairly quickly
customer_reviews.author: Donnab

customer_reviews.title: Recommended by our vet
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use! No bad smell from glue. Only took a few minutes to apply. Stays on for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: scott r. pierce

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me
customer_reviews.text: My cats chewed them off. Might be better for older cats.
customer_reviews.author: SJW

customer_reviews.title: No More Furniture Damage!!!
customer_reviews.text: My kitty loves them. She struggled at first, but now, it’s like second nature minus the clawing of my dog and furniture.
customer_reviews.author: William Mejia

customer_reviews.title: No need to declaw your cats!!! These are so easy & work amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: These work great!!! My cats are no longer destroying my moldings & carpets. They went on so easily & I couldn’t believe my cats didn’t fight me putting them on!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer T

customer_reviews.title: Bad for your cat. Use nail polish & an Emory board
customer_reviews.text: Very inhumane product. The nails continue to grow and they walk on the curled nail. The cap doesnt come off and makes it impossible to trim.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Their probably better if their younger
customer_reviews.text: For my cat she just bit them off she didn’t even last 10 minutes with them and it took me 30 minutes to put them on her lol
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Cat bites tips off
customer_reviews.text: My cat bites the tips off these, and then his claws can grow right through. They are softer than Soft Paws brand and therefore easier for him to destroy.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Fits like a glove!
customer_reviews.text: My kitty barely notices they're on easy to apply and they fit perfectly on to his nails
customer_reviews.author: Aswiz

customer_reviews.title: Product good
customer_reviews.text: My cat hated it and ripped it of pretty quick
customer_reviews.author: Anna Dubinschi

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use & great problem solver!
customer_reviews.text: These are easy to apply & work great! They've stayed on for weeks!
customer_reviews.author: Shauna

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Only one came off but I think it was because my cat kept biting it!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffney Mahaffey

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, quick dry, and have lasted on three different inside cats for more than two weeks!
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Changed my life!!!
customer_reviews.text: The best $10 I've ever spent on Amazon! I'm not exaggerating.
customer_reviews.author: Erika Bruner

customer_reviews.title: Comparable to other brands
customer_reviews.text: Comparable to name brand nail caps, maybe slightly larger than other brands. May get smaller size next time
customer_reviews.author: Marcie W.

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Some of them were shaped weird but other than that they are great.
customer_reviews.author: John Champine

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put on and keeps my cat from scratching the new couch
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My cat can pick these off with his teeth so I hate that, but they work great if you are able to redo them every two weeks about.
customer_reviews.author: Kasey Renfrow

customer_reviews.title: Works way better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: These claw caps stay on really well. My cat doesn't seem to mind them at all. I bought the medium size and she's a average size cat.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very soft for my liking
customer_reviews.text: Softer than I would've liked but overall a good product - wasn't what I was looking for so more than likely won't buy again
customer_reviews.author: Omayra

customer_reviews.title: 💯
customer_reviews.text: Good quality rubber, isn’t too soft to where ur cat can claw through them
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic! Easy to apply, they stay put with the adhesive, and it has saved my woodwork and furniture!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Sampson

customer_reviews.title: Cats can get them off
customer_reviews.text: My kitten can get them off in a few days other than that they are ok
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: Love getting so many cause my cats just chew them off after a week
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Good product, not easy to put on an angry cat lol
customer_reviews.text: Good product, make sure to clip ends of nails first
customer_reviews.author: fanch0304

customer_reviews.title: Shockingly amazing
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! I can’t believe they stay on as long as they do.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: Everything is great except I wish you could close the glue when you're done with it.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: ends break off
customer_reviews.text: the ends keep breaking off a week into kitty wearing them :(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not very happy
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two sets and got one, charged for both
customer_reviews.author: MadKattrucker

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: The colors are nice and bright, but these are less expensive than the brand name for a reason. They're softer and so the top wears of them rather quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Currey May

customer_reviews.title: Great caps!
customer_reviews.text: They stay on wonderfully and after an hour my cat is completely used to them.

product_meta.title: Dadiii Cat Nail Caps 120PCS Soft Claws Paws Grooming Covers for Pet Cat Kiteen to Protect Furniture 6 Colors + 6 Pcs Adhesive Glue and Applicators
product_meta.description:
Size:Medium

In spring, cats and dogs enter estrus and begin to get grumpy.More and more people are accidentally scratched and bitten, even pet owners. Meanwhile, cats often catch bad furniture, sofas, floors and other items, leaving scratches and damaging the home environment.

Cat nail caps are good to effectively prevention of cat scratch disease. With these soft protective rubber pet nail covers, your cat will not accidentally hurt you and your furniture even his/herself by sharp nails, make sure you have fun with your pet cat! 

Multifunctional:
1.Protect the furniture, floor, and home environment
The material of nail caps is environmental protection material with strong flexibility and abrasion resistance, which can effectively prevent the pet cat from scratching the furniture and leaving scratches.
2.Protect the owner of the pet cats
You do not have to worry about being scratched or hooked into your clothes while playing with your kitten cats.
3.Protect the sick pet cat
Avoid sick cat scratches the wound without hindering the free movement of cat.
4.Pet grooming
Dress your pet cat’s nail with this cool items, and makes your pet cats more fashion, cute, special. Your cat will shining in the crowd.

Instructions:
STEP 1: Test the size is proper or not. If the cap is too long for the nails and reaches the nail base, please cut a little bit to prevent inflammation.
STEP 2: Trim the tip of your pet's nails. And leave sufficient claw surface for the glue to adhere properly.
STEP 3: Fill nail caps 1/3 full with adhesive. Let it half dry.
STEP 4: Sliding the cap over the nail. Do it one by one.

Size Guide:
S: Fit for the age of 6 months, weight: 1.5-3kg/3.3-6.6lb;
M: Fit for adult size cats, weight:3-4.5KG/6.6-9.9lb;
L: Fit for large breed cats, weight: 4.5-6kg/9.9-13.2lb
feature_bullets: PRATICAL -- This product and listing belongs to Dadiii, please make sure you place your order from Dadiii instead of other offers. The cat nail covers are perfect items to effectively prevent cat scratch disease, avoid cat scratching the affected area with skin disease, and you do not have to worry about get hurt when play with it, even protect your sofa and furniture against destructive scratching by applying soft claws nail caps

SAFE -- Cat nail caps and adhesive glue have passed the EU's SGS environmental certification, no-toxic and safe. Don’t worry even when your cat chew up the nail caps. The soft paw covers are natural and comfortable after cat get used to them, so the claw covers do not bother your cat's normal behavior. Majority of cats can adapt quickly, please try to distract your cat if he/she try to bite them off, they’ll get used to them a few times later

EASY to USE-- Trim cat nails first(be careful, not too short, otherwise it can’t hold the caps), and then drop a little glue into caps with the applicator (not too much or the glue may spill over), let the glue half dry, and put it on your cat’s nails, and hold the caps to wait the glue become completely dry, make sure the caps attach firmly

FASHIONALE -- Dress up nails for pets cat is interesting, and creative. Dress your pet cat’s nail with this cool items, and offer the grooming services for your cats, makes your pet cats more elegant, cute, special, your cat will shining in the crowd

Patent Packaging -- Our unique packaging with 2 linked cavities in the packaging bag, which are the glue cavity and the nail caps and applicator cavity respectively, and the two cavities are linked by a thermal seal strip. This packaging seperates glue and caps, 1 set for 1 time use, no mess
